column2: Total No. of Cases for Investigation Including Pending Cases from previous year (Col.2)
column4: No. of Cases in which Investigation Refused (Col.4)

column7: No. of Cases in which Investigation was Completed - Charge Sheets Submitted (Col.7)
column8: No. of Cases in which Investigation was Completed - Total (Col.8) = Col.{(5)+(6)+(7)}
column9: No. of Cases Pending Investigation at the end of the year (Col.9)
